title: Meta Zoo - An Immersive Virtual Zoo Experience
description: Meta Zoo is a Three.js-based multiplayer metaverse designed to provide an interactive and educational zoo experience for children. The platform leverages WebSockets for real-time multiplayer interactions, allowing users to explore a vibrant virtual zoo, interact with animals, and even take a ride on a toy train. With features like positional audio and an interactive drawing canvas, Meta Zoo creates an engaging and dynamic environment for kids to learn and play.
features: Positional audio for a realistic sound experience
Canvas drawing feature for creative exploration
Toy train ride for a fun zoo tour
technologies: Positional audio for spatial sound effects
useCases: Providing an engaging and educational experience for children
Enabling multiplayer interactions in a virtual zoo setting
Enhancing digital learning with immersive environments
Encouraging creativity through interactive elements like drawing
